#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std ;

int main()
{

    string s;
    cin >> s;
    int cnt[26];
    memset(cnt , 0 ,sizeof cnt);
    int cntr = 1;
    int mx = 0;
    for(int i = 0 ; i < s.size() ; i++)
    {
        cntr = 1;
        if(i == 0)
        {

        }else
        {
            bool f = false;
            while(s[i] == s[i - 1])
            {
                f = true;
                cntr++,i++;
            }
            if(f)i--;
        }
        //cout << s[i] - 'a' << endl;
        mx = max(cntr,mx);
        cnt[s[i]-'a'] = max(cnt[s[i]-'a'],cntr);
    }
    int out = 0;;
    for(int i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++)
        if(cnt[i] == mx)
            {out = i;break;}
    cout << char(out + 'a')  << endl;
    cout << cnt[out] << endl;
    return 0;
}
